features: VANILLA BEAN Full Body Moisturizer is a described as a sweet, perfumed aroma with a woody undertone to elevate feelings of joy and relaxation.

FULL BODY MOISTURIZER: Formulated to hydrate, moisturize, and nourish your skin for an all-day luxurious, soothing full-body skin treatment. Absorbs quickly into the skin leaving NO greasy residue to clog pores. Handcrafted in small-sized kettles with high personal attention to achieve the perfect consistency & feel to your skin. Your skin will feel the difference!

GENTLE FORMULA: Formulated to moisturize your whole body. Won't irritate extremely dry or sensitive skin. Contains NO parabens, petroleum, artificial colors or dyes. Made w/ high quality ingredients in Indiana, USA.
SOOTHING RELIEF: Immediately relieves discomfort of dry, itchy, scaly, chapped or sunburned skin, psoriasis and eczema anywhere on your body
HANDCRAFTED: Made from high quality, premium ingredients in Indiana, USA. Cruelty Free - Contains 1: 16 oz pump bottle
24-hour, full body moisturizer; Vanilla bean scent
body.description: The Lotion Company's Handmade 24-Hour Skin Therapy is a remarkable blend of ingredients selected to contribute to both health and beauty. These products are carefully handcrafted in modest-sized kettles, not mass-produced in giant vats. The resulting blend is uncommonly easy to apply and absorbs quickly, leaving your skin soft and silky all day. 24-Hour Skin Therapy offers immediate relief for dry, itchy, scaly skin anywhere on your body. Essential vitamins and minerals help calm, nourish, and rehydrate your skin. Glycerin provides additional moisturizing without the greasy residue that petrolatum-based lotions leave behind. Very popular in the healthcare community, 24-Hour Skin Therapy is gentle enough for sensitive skin and doesn't irritate cracked, chapped skin. Nothing is smoother. Nothing is finer. Your skin will tell the difference! Small business located in Muncie, Indiana.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Father/Daughter small-batch skincare Hi! Welcome to The Lotion Company. We are a father/daughter small-batch skincare company from Indiana. We are extremely proud to be a 100% Made in USA small business. We handcraft all of our products in small-sized kettles to ensure that every bottle has the perfect consistency & feel. We formulate with blends of high quality ingredients that contribute to both healthy & beauty. Our products are paraben free, petroleum free & designed to help heal the driest of skin. Thank you for stopping by our page & seeing our product selection. We hope you love our skincare products as much as we love making them! Your skin will feel the difference.

Our small business is handcrafted in Indiana, USA. MADE IN USA We handcraft our entire line in small-kettles to ensure that each bottle has the perfect consistency. Over the years, these lotions have become a special blend of premium ingredients that contribute to both health and beauty. We are proud to be paraben free, petroleum free and completely Made in the USA. Dad/Daughter Small Batch Skincare Company Our product is better than the rest because these are the first four ingredients: Vegetable-based Aloe Vera has a cooling, soothing & moisturizing effect on skin, naturally protecting against irritation Vegetable-based Glycerin helps skin build a barrier to retain moisture, protects skin from environmental damage (UV, pollution etc.) Hawaiian Macadamia Nut Oil supplements skin's natural oil for protection and retaining water for softness Sesame Seed Oil is known to produce glowing skin, reduce dryness, nourish cracked skin, maintain softness & more Paraben Free Petroleum Free Made with High Quality Ingredients Handcrafted in Indiana, USA 100% Made in USA

Our Best Sellers: Baby Powder Fragrance A fresh and powdery aroma that perfects the baby powder fragrance FULL BODY MOISTURIZER: Hydrates, moisturizes, and nourishes your skin for an all-day luxurious, soothing full-body skin treatmentGENTLE FORMULA: Won't irritate extremely dry or sensitive skin; Contains no parabens, petroleum, artificial colors or dyesNO GREASY RESIDUE: Absorbs quickly and leaves no oily film on skin to clog pores Truly Fragrance Free FREE & CLEAR of any and all fragrances, parabens, petroleum, artificial colors/dyes. The perfect option for those who prefer zero fragrance or those who wish to layer your favorite perfume/cologne on top of your skincare routine. ZERO SCENT. Also, a fan favorite for those who like to mix in their own fragrances to the lotion!HIGH QUALITY INGREDIENTS: Aloe Vera, Vegetable-based Glycerin, Hawaiian Macadamia Nut Oil, Vitamins A & E, & more!100% MADE IN THE USA! Vanilla Bean Fragrance A sweet, perfumed aroma with a woody undertone. FULL BODY MOISTURIZER: Hydrates, moisturizes, and nourishes your skin for an all-day luxurious, soothing full-body skin treatmentGENTLE FORMULA: Won't irritate extremely dry or sensitive skin. Contains no parabens, petroleum, artificial colors or dyesNO GREASY RESIDUE: Absorbs quickly and leaves no oily film on skin to clog pores Sugar Scrub Exfoliating Body Wash Handcrafted with all natural ingredients for a soft, yet intense, foaming exfoliation. Apply over entire body in shower or bath. Can be used before & after shavingPair with our full body moisturizer to achieve the softest results. Your skin will feel the difference!Please mix well before useYour skin will feel the difference after just one use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells great and is very moisturizing
reviews.reviewText: I bought this lotion because I saw a video review about how great and long-lasting the scent is. This baby powder scent lasts all day. I love it. The fact that it’s very moisturizing and moisturizes all day is an added bonus. I switched to creams a couple of years ago because most store bought lotions just don’t cut it when it comes to being moisturizing past a couple of hours. This lotion beats any brand name lotion I’ve ever purchased, hands down. I’m pleased with my purchase. I will be trying other scents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice scent, long lasting
reviews.reviewText: The scent is on the sweet side, but it’s perfect for me and exactly what I was looking for. I applied it in the morning before teaching a first grade class and at the end of the day, one of the students mentioned that I smelled like candy. I’m glad to have found a product I like that supports an American small business. Vanilla is my go to scent, but I’m very tempted to try others, especially since they are priced so reasonably.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm thrilled with this product
reviews.reviewText: It smells so good, it softens and moisturizes your skin longer than the others. I am happy it is natural and would love to buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars One of the better vanilla scented lotions on the market
reviews.reviewText: Alright - where to even begin.I'm a 73-year-old man who uses a variety of moisturizing body lotions. I've always enjoyed the smell of vanilla - whether in after-shave or hand/body crèmes. The reference standard in body crèmes that I had used for years was that from the C Booth company that made a 32 ounce container of Vanilla Butter crème that set the standard for both its moisturizing abilities and for the longevity of the vanilla smell (which was most of the day).Since C. Booth is no longer making this crème (a shame really), I had to look for other options. You may still be able to find these 32 ounce C. Booth vanilla butter formulations, but they are going for ridiculous money (again, if you can find them) for anywhere from $65 to $100, which is ridiculous - such was the popularity of this crème formulation.I eventually came across this Lotion Company Vanilla Bean crème and had to give it a try. Now right off the bat, the vanilla smell is not as engrained in this formulation as the vanilla butter was in the C. Booth version. However, right now, this formulation (Lotion Company) is one of the better vanilla formulations on the market, and I'd say that the scent lasts around a half day or so.As for the moisturizing capabilities of this crème, it is outstanding. I use it on my arms and legs, and it keeps them soft and moisturized all day long. I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best vanilla scent I have tried
reviews.reviewText: After my normal lotion was discontinued (Vera Bradley Vanilla Sea Salt), I started my hunt for a new product and have ordered multiple vanilla scented lotions. For a while the EOS vanilla cashmere was my preference but the vanilla scent is somewhat muted in that one. I bought this with relatively low expectations and now I've bought it 3 times in the last week because my teenage daughter loves it just as much. The vanilla scent smells natural, the moisturizing properties last for a decent amount of time and the skin feel wasn't overly oily, plus it's made in the USA!! If you are looking for a good vanilla scented lotion for daily use, you won't be disappointed with this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long lasting lovely scent
reviews.reviewText: I got the Vanilla Bean lotion and I love it. It is very moisturizing without feeling greasy; it absorbs really well into the skin. It is a light scent - not overpowering and the scent lasted (for me) approximately one day! I will be buying more of your scents!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Scent and moisturizing, but not last longing
reviews.reviewText: I bought this cream because I wanted a cheaper version than the bath and body work creams which are expensive. I bought the mango flavor and it smells so good, and it is very moisturizing on my skin, HOWEVER the scent does not last long. The bath and body works scent lotion last kinda of all day, but this one didn't.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft and love the smell
reviews.reviewText: I got this after seeing Chloe’s video! Super moisturizing and smells amazing
